HOT DOG RECALL: Put down the hot dogs!   372,000 pounds of hot dogs and corn dogs are being recalled over concerns of listeria contamination.  Bar-S Foods is recalling five chicken and pork products.   The recalled items include Bar-S bun-length and classic franks made with chicken and pork, Bar-S classic corn dogs and Signature Pick 5 corn dogs.
